metadata.title: CVE-2020-23026 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: A NULL pointer dereference in the main() function dhry_1.c of dhrystone 2.1 causes a denial of service (DoS).

notes.note: sbeattie> gcc-3.3 only provides libstdc++5 amurray> u-boot and gcc both contain embedded copies of dhrystone

criterions.comment: gcc-3.3 package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
gcc-7 package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
